Hand crank generators: Hand crank generators use physical force to generate electricity. They can be used to charge devices when batteries are not working.
Wind turbines: Wind turbines can be used to generate electricity from wind. They can be used to charge devices when batteries are not working.
Hydroelectric power: Hydroelectric power can be used to generate electricity from moving water. It can be used to charge devices when batteries are not working.
Kinetic energy harvesters: Kinetic energy harvesters can convert the energy from motion into electricity. They can be used to charge devices when batteries are not working.
Fuel cells: Fuel cells can generate electricity from a variety of fuels, such as hydrogen or methanol. They can be used to charge devices when batteries are not working.
